no_admin_privileges: This account does not have admin privileges.
failed_login_check_credentials: Failed to login. Please check your credentials.
login_to_admin_panel: Log in to the SoundAlchemy admin panel
admin_area_restricted: This area is restricted to authorized administrators only. Unauthorized access attempts are logged and may be reported.
home_hero_description: A universal platform where musicians from all over the world, regardless of nationality, religion, or culture, can connect, collaborate, and create music together.
home_why_soundalchemy_desc: A trustworthy and professional platform exclusively for musicians to connect and collaborate globally.
home_feature_global_collab_desc: Connect with musicians from every corner of the world and collaborate on projects regardless of distance.
home_feature_live_discussions_desc: Engage in real-time discussions, share knowledge, and learn from musicians across different cultures.
home_feature_cultural_exchange_desc: Explore and exchange musical traditions and techniques from different parts of the world.
home_feature_verified_musicians_desc: Every musician undergoes verification to ensure a trustworthy community free from scams and fake profiles.
home_feature_exclusive_desc: A dedicated platform exclusively for musicians, unlike general social media platforms.
home_free_access_desc: Access all features without any cost, making music collaboration accessible to everyone.
home_first_project_title: Our First Project: A Global Cover of "We Are The World"
home_first_project_desc: As our first major initiative, we are bringing together musicians from different countries to create a cover of "We Are The World." This project will symbolize the unity of musicians worldwide and highlight the power of music in bringing people together.
home_beyond_music: Beyond music, we believe in using our talents to make the world a better place.
home_healing_desc: Our planet gives us so much, but we often fail to appreciate it. It is time for us to give back and heal the world through music. SoundAlchemy aims to create musical projects that raise awareness about global issues and inspire positive change.
home_future_ai_music: The Future of AI and Music
home_future_ai_music_desc: As AI gradually takes over human creativity, now is the time for us to prove that human creativity is irreplaceable. Musicians are the most innovative and emotionally expressive artists in the world, and SoundAlchemy will be their dedicated space to showcase their skills.
home_ready_transform: Ready to Transform the Music World?
home_join_global: Join musicians from across the globe in creating a new era of music collaboration. Be part of something bigger than yourself.
footer_universal_platform: A universal platform where musicians from all over the world, regardless of nationality, religion, or culture, can connect, collaborate, and create music together.
home_welcome_back: Welcome back, Maestro! The world is waiting to hear your next masterpiece.
home_logged_in_description: Dive into a universe of sound, connect with visionary artists, and let your music shape the future. Your creative journey continues here—explore, collaborate, and inspire!
